name: Yawning Face
baseMeaning: A face yawning with a hand covering the mouth.
tldr: Tired, sleepy, bored, or something is uninteresting. The polite way to say 'boring.'

platformNotes.note: Often used to dismiss hot takes or unoriginal content.

generationalNotes.note: Heavily used to indicate boredom or dismissal.
Uses for both tiredness and boredom.
More likely to interpret as simply tired.

warnings.title: Can Be Dismissive
warnings.description: Often implies boredom rather than tiredness. Can seem rude.
